metadata.title: UPJUNOO PRO | Mobility & Logistics - Taxi, Delivery, Rental, Freight
metadata.description: Smart, simple and inclusive mobility. VTC/Taxi, express delivery, vehicle rental and urban freight combined in a single platform. International solution available in multiple countries.

faq.title: Frequently
faq.description: Quickly find answers to your most common questions about UPJUNOO PRO.
faq.notFound: Didn't find the answer to your question?

items.question: How do I download the UPJUNOO PRO app?
items.answer: The UPJUNOO PRO app is available for free on the App Store for iOS and Google Play for Android. Search for 'UPJUNOO PRO' and download the app in seconds.

items.question: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: We accept several payment methods: credit card, mobile payment, e-wallet and cash payment depending on the region. You can set your preferred payment method in the app.

items.question: How do I become an UPJUNOO PRO driver?
items.answer: To become an UPJUNOO PRO driver, go to the 'Partner Offers > Drivers' page and fill out the registration form. You will be contacted by an approved fleet manager who will assist you through the process.

items.question: Is UPJUNOO PRO available in my city?
items.answer: UPJUNOO PRO is present in over 100 cities worldwide. Check our 'Our Locations' page to verify availability in your region. If we're not there yet, you can become a franchise!

items.question: How does the delivery service work?
items.answer: The UPJUNOO PRO delivery service allows you to send and receive packages in real time. Simply enter the pickup and delivery addresses, and a courier takes care of the rest. You can track your package live.

items.question: How do I contact customer support?
items.answer: Our support team is available 24/7. You can contact us via the app, by email at contact@upjunoopro.com, or via our Contact page. We are committed to responding as quickly as possible.

items.question: How do I become an UPJUNOO PRO franchise?
items.answer: To become a franchise, go to the 'Partner Offers > Franchises' page. There you will find all the information about the desired profile, benefits and conditions. Contact our team to discuss your project.

items.question: How are rides calculated?
items.answer: UPJUNOO PRO rides are calculated based on distance and travel time. You always see an estimate before confirming your ride. No surprises, everything is transparent.

footer.description: UPJUNOO PRO is a platform that allows you to order taxis, send packages and rent vehicles with ease.
